bibl.title: A Stray Late Roman Coin from the Temple of Hatshepsut at Deir el-Bahari.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Discusses a vota coin, possibly of Theodosius I (AD 379-383). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Barbara Lichocka, A Stray Late Roman Coin from the Temple of Hatshepsut at Deir el-Bahari.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 679-690, 4 figg.
Discusses a vota coin, possibly of Theodosius I (AD 379-383). - Avec résumé en anglais.
